name: Magma Armor
long-desc: This Pokemon cannot be frozen.  If a Pokemon is frozen and acquires this ability, it will immediately thaw out; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.  Overworld: If any Pokemon in the party has this ability, each egg in the party has its hatch counter decreased by 2 (rather than 1) each step cycle, making eggs hatch roughly twice as quickly.  This effect does not stack if multiple Pokemon have this ability or .
